item.description:
I am cross posting this to other groups. Needs to be at least 3 people combined from all groups to make this a go...plus the weather needs to be favorable.
I am attaching a couple links for you to check out. Let me know if there are any questions.
http://www.umiak.com/Summer/Rental.html
http://www.vtstateparks.com/htm/waterbury.htm

We are meeting at the Blush Hill Access.Â  89, Exit 10/Waterbury

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Paddle Waterbury Reservoir
